00026 // be sure that this file not accessed directly
00027 if (basename($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']) == basename(__FILE__)) {
00028     die();
00029 }
00030 
00031 // always use session cookies
00032 @ini_set('session.use_cookies', true);
00033 // use more secure session ids
00034 @ini_set('session.hash_function', 1);
00035 // some pages (e.g. stylesheet) may be cached on clients, but not in shared proxy servers
00036 @session_cache_limiter('private');
00037 // set session name and start the session
00038 @session_name(SENAYAN_MEMBER_SESSION_COOKIES_NAME);
00039 // set session cookies params
00040 @session_set_cookie_params(86400, SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR);
